text: Bengt Berndtsson (26 January 1933 â€“ 4 June 2015) was a Swedish football winger. He was born in Gothenburg. Berndtsson played for the Sweden national football team, and was a member of the squad at the 1958 FIFA World Cup finals. ==Other websites== * Obituary - Expressen Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swedish footballers Category:Sportspeople from Gothenburg
title: Bengt Berndtsson
